channel.title: Shop adding ( Please Help )
channel.description:
I tryed to add a shop but this came up on my runserver and i got disconnected
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -81 at client.parseIncomingPackets<client.java:14199> at client.packetProcess<client.java:13195> at client.process<client.java:13165> at playerHandler.Process<PlayerHandler.java:136> at server.main<server.java:45>[/code]
These are the script i added:
This in autospawn: [code]spawn = 520 3207 3433 0 0 0 0 0 1 Rare_Shop[/code]
This in Client [code]}else if (NPCID == 520) { //rare shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41;[/code]
This in shop.cfg [code]shop = 41 Rare_Shop 1 1 6188 2000 1057 2000 1055 2000 1053 2000 1048 2000 1046 2000 1044 2000 1042 2000 1040 2000 1038 2000 1050 2000 [/code]
can someone please tell me wat is wrong with it please!!!!
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 08:37:53 PM[/size][hr]please help someone

im not sure how i think the problem is in my client

} else if (NPCID == 1699) { //Herb Seed Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 40; } else if (NPCID == 520) { //rare shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; } else if (NPCID == 1 || NPCID == 2 || NPCID == 3 || NPCID == 4 || NPCID == 5 || NPCID == 6) { //THEIVING MAN & WOMEN if (stealtimer < 0 && EntangleDelay < 0) { robman(); EntangleDelay = 6; stealtimer = 15; // snaretimer = 5; setAnimation(881); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
